description: Allow users leaving your server to do so with a suiting message!
set: {emotes.success} | Goodbye messages set up. You can test them with {prefix}goodbye test
withImage: {emotes.use} | Should I also be sending a picture? Answer yes or no
messageTooLong: {emotes.error} | The message may not be longer than 1800 symbols. That's a loong goodbye message dude
chooseMessage: {emotes.use} | Set the goodbye message. You can refer to the user by using `%user`, the member count with `%membercount` and the server name by using `%server`
